help.short: Name of the Network to Network Interconnect.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="interfaces">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="peLoopbackIpAddress">
<prop type="array" name="prefixLimits">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">

help.short: Name of the Network to Network Interconnect.

command.name: create

help.short: Name of the Network to Network Interconnect.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.conditionalDefaultRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" options="ipv4-routes">
<arg type="array" var="@StaticRouteProperties_create.nextHop" options="next-hop" required="True">
<arg type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" var="$resource.properties.conditionalDefaultRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" options="ipv6-routes">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.layer2Configuration.interfaces" options="interfaces">
<arg type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" var="$resource.properties.npbStaticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" options="ipv4-routes">
<arg type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" var="$resource.properties.npbStaticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" options="ipv6-routes">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.optionBLayer3Configuration.peLoopbackIpAddress" options="pe-loopback-ip-address">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.optionBLayer3Configuration.prefixLimits" options="prefix-limits">
<arg type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" var="$resource.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" options="ipv4-routes">
<arg type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" var="$resource.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" options="ipv6-routes">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" arg="$resource.properties.conditionalDefaultRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" arg="@StaticRouteProperties_create.nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" name="ipv6Routes" arg="$resource.properties.conditionalDefaultRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="interfaces" arg="$resource.properties.layer2Configuration.interfaces">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" name="ipv4Routes" arg="$resource.properties.npbStaticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" name="ipv6Routes" arg="$resource.properties.npbStaticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="peLoopbackIpAddress" arg="$resource.properties.optionBLayer3Configuration.peLoopbackIpAddress">
<prop type="array" name="prefixLimits" arg="$resource.properties.optionBLayer3Configuration.prefixLimits">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" name="ipv4Routes" arg="$resource.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" name="ipv6Routes" arg="$resource.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">

<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="interfaces">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="peLoopbackIpAddress">
<prop type="array" name="prefixLimits">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">

command.name: update

help.short: Name of the Network to Network Interconnect.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.layer2Configuration.interfaces" options="interfaces">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.npbStaticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" options="ipv4-routes">
<arg type="array" var="@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update.nextHop" options="next-hop" required="True">
<arg type="array<@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update>" var="$properties.properties.npbStaticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" options="ipv6-routes">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.optionBLayer3Configuration.peLoopbackIpAddress" options="pe-loopback-ip-address">
<arg type="array" var="$properties.properties.optionBLayer3Configuration.prefixLimits" options="prefix-limits">
<arg type="array<@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update>" var="$properties.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" options="ipv4-routes">
<arg type="array<@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update>" var="$properties.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" options="ipv6-routes">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="interfaces" arg="$properties.properties.layer2Configuration.interfaces">
<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" arg="$properties.properties.npbStaticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" arg="@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update.nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array<@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update>" name="ipv6Routes" arg="$properties.properties.npbStaticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="peLoopbackIpAddress" arg="$properties.properties.optionBLayer3Configuration.peLoopbackIpAddress">
<prop type="array" name="prefixLimits" arg="$properties.properties.optionBLayer3Configuration.prefixLimits">
<prop type="array<@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update>" name="ipv4Routes" arg="$properties.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@StaticRoutePatchProperties_update>" name="ipv6Routes" arg="$properties.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">

<prop type="array" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="nextHop" required="True">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="interfaces">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array" name="peLoopbackIpAddress">
<prop type="array" name="prefixLimits">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv4Routes" identifiers="prefix">
<prop type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_read>" name="ipv6Routes" identifiers="prefix">
